articles.author: Robert Pearlman
articles.title: James Lovell, the steady astronaut who brought Apollo 13 home safely, has died - Ars Technica
articles.description: James Lovell, a member of humanity’s first trip to the moon and commander of NASA’s ill-fated Apollo 13 mission, has died at the age of 97.

articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Former Googlers’ AI startup OpenArt now creates ‘brain rot’ videos in just one click - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenArt launched a new feature to help creators make AI-generated brain rot videos.
articles.content: AI-generated “brain rot” videos are popping up all over the internet and getting a lot of attention. Currently gaining traction among younger users, these clips feature wild characters, like a shark … [+4202 chars]

articles.title: Eat More, Weigh Less. Why Whole Foods Are the Real Weight Loss Hack - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A bowl of homemade spaghetti Bolognese helped people lose nearly twice the weight of those eating ready-made meals, even with the same nutrients.
articles.content:
